patterns: Hi|Hello|How are you|Good morning|Good evening|Hey|Hi there|Greetings
responses: Hello!|Hi there!|How can I assist you today?|Good to see you!|Hi! How can I help you?

patterns: Bye|See you later|Goodbye|Take care|Catch you later|Farewell
responses: Goodbye!|See you later!|Have a great day!|Take care!

patterns: Where is my order?|Order status|Track my order|Order tracking|Can you tell me the status of my order?|I want to track my order
responses: Please provide your order number.|Can you give me your order ID?|I need your order number to check the status.

patterns: Tell me about product X|What are the features of product Y?|Price of product Z|Can you give me details about product X?|I'm interested in product Y
responses: Product X is a [description]. It costs [price].|Product Y has the following features: [features].|The price of product Z is [price].

patterns: What is your return policy?|How can I return an item?|What are the conditions for returning a product?
responses: Our return policy allows returns within 30 days of purchase.|You can return items within 30 days as long as they are in original condition.

patterns: What are the shipping options?|How long does shipping take?|Do you offer expedited shipping?
responses: We offer standard and expedited shipping options.|Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days
column4: and expedited shipping takes 1-2 business days.

patterns: What payment methods do you accept?|Can I pay with PayPal?|Do you accept credit cards?
responses: We accept PayPal
column5: and debit cards.|You can pay using Visa

patterns: Are there any discounts available?|Do you have any current promotions?|Can I apply a discount code?
responses: We have seasonal discounts and promotions. Check our website for the latest offers.|You can apply discount codes during checkout.

patterns: How can I contact customer support?|I need help with my order|Can I speak to a representative?
responses: You can contact our customer support at support@example.com or call us at 123-456-7890.|Our customer support is available 24/7 to assist you.

patterns: I'm having technical issues|The website is not working|I can't place an order
responses: Please try refreshing the page or clearing your browser cache.|If the issue persists
column4: contact our technical support team at techsupport@example.com.

patterns: How can I create an account?|I forgot my password|How do I reset my password?
responses: You can create an account by clicking on the "Sign Up" button on our website.|To reset your password
column4: click on "Forgot Password" on the login page.

patterns: Can I cancel my order?|How do I cancel my order?|Is it possible to cancel my order after placing it?
responses: You can cancel your order within 2 hours of placing it by contacting our support team.|After 2 hours
column4: cancellation may not be possible as the order might already be processed.

patterns: Can I get a refund?|What is the refund process?|How long does it take to get a refund?
responses: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after the return is received.|You can request a refund through our customer support.

patterns: How long does delivery take?|When will my order arrive?|Delivery time estimate
responses: Delivery usually takes 3-5 business days for standard shipping.|Expedited shipping takes 1-2 business days.

patterns: Do you offer discounts for bulk orders?|How can I place a bulk order?|Bulk order pricing
responses: Yes
column4: we offer discounts for bulk orders. Please contact sales@example.com for more information.|You can place a bulk order by contacting our sales team.

patterns: Is there a warranty for product X?|How long is the warranty?|Warranty terms
responses: Product X comes with a 1-year warranty covering manufacturing defects.|Please refer to our warranty policy for detailed information.

patterns: Where are your stores located?|Store location near me|Find a store
responses: You can find our store locations on our website under the "Store Locator" section.|Please visit our "Store Locator" page to find a store near you.

patterns: What are the benefits of membership?|How do I become a member?|Membership rewards
responses: Members receive exclusive discounts
column5: and special promotions.|You can sign up for membership on our website.

patterns: Can I change my order?|How do I modify my order?|Change order details
responses: You can modify your order within 2 hours of placing it by contacting our support team.|After 2 hours

patterns: Do you offer gift cards?|How can I purchase a gift card?|Gift card balance
responses: Yes
column4: we offer gift cards. You can purchase them on our website.|To check your gift card balance

patterns: What is your loyalty program?|How do I earn points?|Redeem loyalty points
responses: Our loyalty program allows you to earn points on every purchase.|You can redeem points for discounts on future purchases.

patterns: Is product X in stock?|When will product Y be available?|Check stock status
responses: You can check the availability of product X on our website.|Product Y is expected to be back in stock soon.

patterns: What is your contact number?|How can I email you?|Customer service contact
responses: You can contact us at 123-456-7890 or email us at support@example.com.|Our contact details are available on the "Contact Us" page.

patterns: What are your social media handles?|Follow us on social media|Social media links
responses: You can follow us on Facebook
column5: and Instagram.|Our social media links are available on our website.

patterns: How do I sign up for the newsletter?|Benefits of newsletter subscription|Newsletter subscription
responses: You can sign up for our newsletter on our website.|Subscribers receive exclusive news

patterns: How do I return product X?|Return instructions for product Y|Return shipping
responses: You can return product X by following the instructions on our returns page.|Please use the return shipping label provided with your order.

patterns: Did my order go through?|I didn't receive an order confirmation|Order confirmation email
responses: You should receive an order confirmation email shortly after placing your order.|If you didn't receive a confirmation
column4: please check your spam folder or contact support.

patterns: What are your holiday hours?|Are you open on holidays?|Store hours during holidays
responses: Our holiday hours are listed on our website.|Please check our "Store Hours" page for holiday hours.

patterns: What size should I order?|Size guide for product X|How do I know my size?
responses: You can find our size guide on the product page.|Please refer to the size guide to choose the correct size.

patterns: I need help with my order|Order assistance|Help with placing an order
responses: Our customer support team is here to help you with your order.|Please contact us if you need assistance with your order.

patterns: Do you have any coupon codes?|How do I apply a coupon?|Current promo codes
responses: You can apply a coupon code at checkout.|Check our website for current promotions and coupon codes.

patterns: How do I delete my account?|Remove my account|Delete account information
responses: Please contact customer support to delete your account.|We can assist you with account deletion.

patterns: My payment didn't go through|Payment failed|Problem with payment
responses: Please check your payment details and try again.|If the issue persists
column4: contact our support team for assistance.

patterns: Can I get a copy of my receipt?|Request order receipt|Email receipt
responses: You can request a copy of your receipt by contacting our support team.|We can email you a copy of your order receipt.

patterns: Compare product X and Y|Difference between product A and B|Which product is better?
responses: Product X has the following features: [features]. Product Y has the following features: [features].|Compare the specifications on our product comparison page.

patterns: My order is delayed|Why is my order taking so long?|Delay in delivery
responses: We apologize for the delay. Your order is on its way.|Please check the tracking information for updates on your order.

patterns: Can I exchange product X?|Exchange process|How to exchange an item
responses: Yes
column4: you can exchange items within 30 days of purchase.|Please follow the instructions on our exchange page.

patterns: Do you offer custom orders?|How can I order a custom product?|Custom order details
responses: Yes
column4: we offer custom orders. Please contact our sales team for more information.|You can place a custom order by filling out the form on our website.

patterns: Does product X come with a warranty?|Warranty coverage|Warranty details
responses: Product X comes with a 1-year warranty covering manufacturing defects.|Please refer to our warranty page for more details.

patterns: Verify my order|Order verification|Check order status
responses: Please provide your order number for verification.|We need your order ID to verify the status.

patterns: Do you offer gift wrapping?|How can I add gift wrapping to my order?|Gift wrapping service
responses: Yes
column4: we offer gift wrapping services. You can add it during checkout.|Gift wrapping options are available on the product page.

patterns: How can I leave feedback?|Customer review|Rate your experience
responses: You can leave feedback on our website under the "Reviews" section.|We appreciate your feedback and suggestions.

patterns: There is an issue with my order|Problem with my order|Order arrived damaged
responses: We apologize for the inconvenience. Please contact our support team to resolve the issue.|We will assist you with any problems related to your order.

patterns: Do you offer subscription services?|Subscribe to product X|Subscription details
responses: Yes
column4: we offer subscription services for select products.|You can subscribe on the product page to receive regular deliveries.

patterns: Do you offer price matching?|Price match policy|Match competitor's price
responses: Yes
column4: we offer price matching. Please provide proof of the competitor's price.|Our price match policy is available on our website.

patterns: Where can I find the FAQ?|Frequently Asked Questions|Common questions
responses: You can find the FAQ section on our website.|Please visit our FAQ page for answers to common questions.

patterns: How do I track my order?|Order tracking link|Track shipment
responses: You can track your order using the link provided in your confirmation email.|Enter your order ID on our tracking page to check the status.
